Reviews.Title: Midland Video Cam
Reviews.Author: Doctor Moto "DRM"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Inexpensive, easy to use. Has just an OFF/ON switch, and not much else. Charges via USB cable or 110V adapter. Movies can be easily viewed or edited on laptop or desktop computer.Cons: Cheap construction. Microphone cannot be turned off. Only suggested solution is to stick a piece of tape over the hole. Manual is very succinct and lacks detail. No viewfinder, and aiming is by trial and error, mostly the latter. Has single focus wide angle lens, which gives a fish-eye view of the world. Accessories provided are of limited utility and a puzzle to use. Camera is not waterproof.In summary: You get what you pay for. OK for a beginner, but if you plan to do serious filming you'd better invest a little more in a quality product.

Reviews.Title: My First Camera
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: This camera is very small, which is very convenient for portability. The only thing that turns me off is the image quality when in low lighting. The visual gets a grainy effect if you aren't in a well lit room. It's very simple to use for those who aren't tech savvy. I do highly recommend that you buy a class 4 mini SD card. The lower the class, the lower the image quality.

Reviews.Title: I returned this for a refund.
Reviews.Author: Rickochet
Reviews.Content: I found that this camera had many short comings that I was not happy with.  The camera did not stay recording and would shut down after a few minutes of run time.  The battery was fully charged  but still would shut down.  The picture that was recorded was very grainy and below par for a 720p.  I have a friend who has a GoPro 720p  that is very clear.  The download to the computer also took a very long time, even for the short bursts of recording the camera was able to obtain. I would suggest that if you are looking for reliability and clarity, spend a little more and purchase another brand of cam. Sorry Midland... you make awesome weather alert radios, but not so good on the cameras.
